tasks.title: Ensure test_evaluate_cluster.py doesn't skip in CI
tasks.description: Test skips if samples/ directory missing or insufficient docs. Verify CI has proper test fixtures or mark appropriately.

tasks.title: Review test_semantics_coverage.py numpy dependency
tasks.description: Two tests skip if numpy unavailable. Consider adding numpy to dev deps or marking with @pytest.mark.optional.

tasks.title: Document runtime skip conditions in test files
tasks.description: Tests with skipTest() calls should document why they skip. Consider converting to explicit markers where possible.
